description: Beretta's final challenge! Hoping to secure her place as an Upper Floor slave, Beretta endures a difficult crotch rope and bears a lot of weight on her pussy but bravely sticks it out. She pushes her limits to the very edge in a challenging blindfolded position. She is shaking with fear in anticipation for the next blow; the sensory deprivation is a mind-fuck! Can Beretta pass the ultimate test of self control and discipline?
title: Day 5 for Beretta. Will she be the perfect slave?
